The Evil Chicken is a version of the Evil Chicken fought during the Freeing Sir Amik Varze subquest of Recipe for Disaster. He is found in the Evil Chicken's Lair, and drops the egg needed to create the Brulee supreme.

He can be fought in the Nightmare Zone after the Recipe for Disaster quest is complete.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
  • 2 Trivia
  • 3 References

Drops[edit | edit source]

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always770
Raw chicken1Always1030
Feather50–250Always[d 1][1]150–75050–250
Evil chicken's egg1Always[d 2]Not sold0
  1. ^ The quantity of feathers scales with your combat level. A ring of wealth may also increase the quantity.
  2. ^ Evil chicken's eggs are only dropped in the Evil Chicken's Lair during Recipe for Disaster.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text "A Fowl Beast" is a pun, as "fowl" means bird, and is a homophone of "foul" which means evil.
  • Attempting to use a ring of recoil while fighting the evil chicken will result in the message "Your ring of recoil seems useless against this creature."
  • The book on chickens discusses rumours and tales surrounding the Evil Chicken's origins.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 October 2020. (Archived from the original on 31 October 2020.) Mod Ash: "Considering the thing's picking random numbers for its feathers with a pretty big range, it may not be obvious whether the ring helped or not."

The '''Evil Chicken''' is a version of the [[Evil Chicken]] fought during the [[Freeing Sir Amik Varze]] subquest of [[Recipe for Disaster]]. He is found in the [[Evil Chicken's Lair]], and drops the egg needed to create the [[Brulee supreme]].

He can be fought in the [[Nightmare Zone]] after the [[Recipe for Disaster]] quest is complete. 

==Drops==
===100%===
{{DropsTableHead}}
{{DropsLine|name=Bones|quantity=1|rarity=Always}}
{{DropsLine|name=Raw chicken|quantity=1|rarity=Always}}
{{DropsLine|name=Feather|quantity=50-250|rarity=Always|raritynotes=<ref group=d>The quantity of feathers scales with your combat level. A [[ring of wealth]] may also increase the quantity.</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1322288174664699904|date=30 October 2020|quote=Considering the thing's picking random numbers for its feathers with a pretty big range, it may not be obvious whether the ring helped or not.|archiveurl=https://archive.is/f3abb|archivedate=31 October 2020}}}}
{{DropsLine|name=Evil chicken's egg|quantity=1|rarity=Always|raritynotes=<ref group=d>Evil chicken's eggs are only dropped in the [[Evil Chicken's Lair]] during [[Recipe for Disaster]].</ref>|gemw=No}}
{{DropsTableBottom}}
{{Reflist|group=d}}

==Trivia==
*The examine text "A Fowl Beast" is a pun, as "fowl" means bird, and is a homophone of "foul" which means evil.
*Attempting to use a  [[ring of recoil]] while fighting the evil chicken will result in the message "Your ring of recoil seems useless against this creature."
*The [[book on chickens]] discusses rumours and tales surrounding the Evil Chicken's origins.
